short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and minimal new tab page to remind us how short and precious life is.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lifetime New Tab replaces your new tab page with a minimal and aesthetic alternative.

It uses a custom life expectancy to show what percentage of your life you have lived, serving as a reminder that our time is limited.

All colors are fully customizable, to match your personal style.

We hope Lifetime can serve as motivation to do whatever it is you want to do with 100% of your lifetime.
